tool_description: JSON API for The Secret World. Letting you use character, cabal, ability and item data from TSW for your own projects.
name: The Secret World
title: The Secret World

api_list.name: Character
Cabal
Abilities
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://destru-the-secret-world.p.rapidapi.com/data/abilities.json"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "destru-the-secret-world.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
